DOC.detailed_description: PRIMARY OBJECTIVES : I . To compare tumor uptake 64Cu-DOTA-trastuzumab ( copper Cu 64-DOTA-trastuzumab ) gastric cancer patient pathologic evaluation tumor human epidermal growth factor receptor 2 ( HER2 ) /neu expression . II . To compare copper Cu 64-DOTA-trastuzumab-PET-CT scan standard radiographic image stag patient gastric cancer . OUTLINE : Patients receive copper Cu 64-DOTA-trastuzumab intravenously ( IV ) day 1 undergo PET/CT scan day 2 3 . After completion study , patient follow 15 day periodically 6 month .
